original_text: Someone told him, ‘Look! Your mother and brothers are standing outside. They want to speak to you.’
korean_text: 한 사람이 예수께 여짜오되 보소서 당신의 어머니와 동생들이 당신께 말하려고 밖에 서 있나이다 하니

sentences.original_text: Your mother and brothers are standing outside
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 어머니와 형제들이 밖에 서 있습니다

sentences.original_text: They want to speak to you
